name: Mini Dungeon (Tavyz)
description:
Story

The King is in need of adventurers to get a Golden Flower that only blooms during autumn. He wants it to give as a present for his daughter, the princess. As a brave adventurer yourself, there is only one thing left to do, retrieve the Golden Flower from the bottom of the dungeon and get filthy rich.

Progress through the spooky dungeon by upgrading your equipment and slaying countless monsters. Each room in confined to a 3x3 grid of movable space.

Controls
  • Move/Interact - Arrow Keys
  • ESC - Exit/Return to Menu

Created for NHREC Game Jam
